title: Steam Interface Application + Half Life minimal theme
description:
zombiRG Presents:


Half Life Minimal Theme and Steam Interface 3.0


program specs:
windows operating system
need rainmeter installed
runs on WinXP,7,7ult,8
steam account needed to access some features


creators note:
SI3 or known as Steam Interface 3.0 is an on desktop fully operatonal steam interface. You can run all steam operations from this app alone as well as rss torrents and other sites. It has tons of controls, from skins to color controls to adding your utorrent downloads to adding your games.
You can add 3 accounts to it; Steam, Gmail, and Utorrent
it has a built in black wallpaper as well as built in Winamp.WMP,AIMP,FOOBAR2000,ITNES,MUSICBEE,MEDIAMONKEY music players all inside the app.
SpeedFan controls are built in too.
Color customization is open to the user as they choose.
program bar interface is connected to the main CP with fully customizable text/paths.Icons are also changable.
Feed:
rss your sites to keep up on news or new torrents via the feed app and skin built in to the control panel. 
Connections:
on desktop shortcuts to online sites with one click
Steam Friends list:
have your friends loaded in the small box to show who is ready to be pwnd 
Full readable stats from pc:
ram,swap,cpu,network,processor temps,gpu,memory,program bar,date,time,up time, and loads more.



Theme:
Half Life theme has both light and dark walls at 1080p. Icons and png's for desktop and rocketdock alike
WMP 3rd party skin in Half Life2 theme with alternate menus.
Sound effects built in to all.



follow the internal readme to the letter to avoid confusion any questions leave a comment on the original torrent in feedback found at kickass.to
or
join irc in efnet server and add our chan at #zombiRG
enjoy and seed
